section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: These Terms and Conditions of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the sports prediction platform ("Service"). By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to any part of these Terms, you may not use the Service.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.item1: "Platform" refers to our website, mobile application, and all related services.
section2.item2: "User" or "You" refers to any person who accesses or uses the Platform.
section2.item3: "Pool" refers to a sports prediction event organized on our Platform.
section2.item4: "Prediction" refers to a user's estimate of the outcome of a sports match.
section2.item5: "Points" refers to the score accumulated from correct predictions according to Pool rules.

section3.title: 3. User Eligibility
section3.content: To use our Service, you must meet the following requirements:
section3.requirement1: Be at least 18 years of age or the age of majority in your jurisdiction.
section3.requirement2: Have the legal capacity to enter into a binding contract.
section3.requirement3: Not be prohibited from using the Service under applicable laws.
section3.requirement4: Provide accurate and complete registration information.

section4.title: 4. Account Registration
section4.content: By registering, you agree to provide true, accurate, and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your access credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.
section4.disclaimer: We reserve the right to suspend or cancel accounts that violate these Terms.

section5.title: 5. User Conduct
section5.prohibited1: Use the Platform in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations.
section5.prohibited2: Engage in fraud, result manipulation, or collusion with other Users.
section5.prohibited3: Access or attempt to access unauthorized systems or data.
section5.prohibited4: Transmit malware, viruses, or malicious code.
section5.prohibited5: Harass, threaten, or defame other Users.
section5.prohibited6: Use bots, scripts, or automated tools without authorization.

section6.title: 6. Predictions and Scoring
section6.content: Predictions must be made before match kickoff. Once a match begins, predictions are automatically locked and cannot be modified. Scoring is calculated automatically according to Pool rules.
section6.scoringDetails: Exact score: 5 points | Correct sign (1X2): 3 points | Goal difference: 1 point. Tiebreakers are resolved using predefined criteria for each Pool.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: All content on the Platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by or licensed to us. You may not reproduce, distribute, or transmit this content without our prior written permission.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of or inability to use the Service.
section8.disclaimer: The Service is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied.

section9.title: 9. Indemnification
section9.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless our company, its directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your violation of these Terms or your use of the Service.

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without notice, if you violate these Terms or if we determine your conduct is harmful to the Platform or its Users.

section11.title: 11. Modifications to Terms
section11.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will take effect when posted to the Platform. Your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Mexico, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes shall be resolved in the competent courts of Mexico.

section13.title: 13. Contact
section13.content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us through our contact form on the Platform.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our sports prediction platform.

subsection1.title: Information Provided Directly
subsection1.content: Full name, email address, phone number, profile information, and any other information you voluntarily provide.

subsection2.title: Information Collected Automatically
subsection2.content: IP address, browser type, pages visited, access time and date, and general Platform usage data.

subsection3.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
subsection3.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and collect analytical data.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.use1: Provide, maintain, and improve the Service.
section3.use2: Process transactions and send related information.
section3.use4: Detect and prevent fraud and illegal activities.
section3.use6: Personalize your experience on the Platform.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases:
section4.sharing1: Service providers who help us operate the Platform.
section4.sharing2: When required by law or legal process.
section4.sharing3: To protect our rights, privacy, or security.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We implement technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
section5.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the Service and comply with our legal obligations. You may request account deletion at any time.

section8.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
section8.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
section8.details: Essential cookies cannot be disabled, but analytics and marketing cookies can be rejected.

section9.title: 9. Third-Party Links
section9.content: Our Platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies.

section10.title: 10. Children's Privacy
section10.content: Our Service is not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If we discover we have collected information from a minor, we will delete it immediately.

section11.title: 11. GDPR Compliance
section11.content: If you are a resident of the European Union, your data is protected under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You have additional rights under this regulation.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact form.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our sports prediction platform. Cookies are small text files stored on your device.

section2.title: 2. What Are Cookies?
section2.content: Cookies are small text files stored in your web browser. They are used to remember information about you, such as your preferences and browsing activity. Cookies can be persistent (remain on your device) or session-based (deleted when you close your browser).

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for basic Platform functionality, such as authentication and security. Cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.content: Collect information about how you use the Platform to improve its functionality and user experience.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: Allow you to personalize your experience by remembering your preferences and settings.

targeting.title: Targeting Cookies
targeting.content: Used to display relevant content and personalized advertisements based on your interests.

section4.title: 4. Specific Cookies
section4.intro: We use the following main cookies:

cookie2.name: user_preferences
cookie2.purpose: Save your language and theme preferences

cookie3.name: analytics_token
cookie3.purpose: Track activity for analytics and improvement

section5.title: 5. Managing Cookies
section5.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to reject cookies or alert you when a cookie is sent.
section5.browser1: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies

section6.title: 6. Third-Party Cookies
section6.content: We may allow third parties to place cookies on your device for analytics, advertising, and social media services. These third parties have their own cookie policies.

section7.title: 7. Do Not Track
section7.content: If your browser sends a "Do Not Track" signal, we will respect that preference for non-essential tracking cookies.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.content: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on the Platform.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us through our contact form.
